name: KindaOS
description:
"It's Kinda an OS"

Yes, it is. KindaOS is a terminal-based simulation game based off of the Linux terminal -- Even with the commands. In this imaginary OS, the system is fragmented, and you need to fix it! Explore the filesystem, find new programs, and restore the disk. Just be careful! If too many files are in a folder, the "physical" disk will collapse from the weight of the files. Just explore and have fun.

For help, download help.txt.

This game is released but will be updated in future. If you find any "Magic Tricks" (bugs), feel free to comment and let me know.
